casebody.data:
JONES
v.
DAVIS. No. 232A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 23, 2004. Urs R. Gsteiger, Elizabeth Horton, Howard C. Jones, II, Winston-Salem, for Jones, Southard, Bowers, Sammons. Raymond A. Parker, Jonesville, for Davis and Allred. Edwin M. Woltz, Surry County Attorney, Mount Airy, for Surry County.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of November 2004 by Defendant To Be Allowed to File Amendment to Defendant's (Surry County) Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of November 2004."
